title: Kashyam
textPreview: Military officer and noble. Talented musician. Son of Zevar Pasha, who he hates. Has an abyssal spirit inside him that gives him powers

content.text: Military officer and noble. Talented musician. Son of Zevar Pasha, who he hates. Has an abyssal spirit inside him that gives him powers
